Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: Asymmetric structure with selective dense mixed-matrix top layer on a porous bottom layer

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Enhanced molecular sieving property of ZIF-8 nanofillers resulting from the restricted linker swing motion

Other Information.Additional Info: C3H6 permeance of 7.48 ± 1.39 GPU at 40 °C coagulation bath temperature

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale due to restricted linker swing motion of ZIF-8 fillers

Other Information.Additional Info: C3H6/C3H8 separation factor of 106.93 ± 14.42 at 40 °C coagulation bath temperature

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale due to restricted linker swing motion of ZIF-8 fillers

Experimental Validation.Method: Wicke-Kallenbach technique, Gas chromatography (GC) with flame ionized detector (FID)

Other Information.Additional Info: The PIMOF process enabled one-step facile preparation of ZIF-8-containing MMMs with defect-free ultra-thin selective mixed-matrix skin layers
